original_title: America’s Game: 1973 Dolphins | Super Bowl VIII
overview: A documentary about the 1973-74 Miami Dolphins and their return to the Super Bowl. The previous year they had completed a perfect undefeated season, but even so after this Super Bowl Coach Don Shula said “I think that we’re a better team than we were a year ago at this time.” They didn’t just defend their world title, they pummeled their opponents while doing so.
title: America’s Game: 1973 Dolphins | Super Bowl VIII
